attributes.action: Make the new Model Tenancy Agreement legally binding
attributes.additional_details: Currently, just 7% of private landlords advertise pet friendly properties, meaning many people struggle to find suitable homes. In some cases, this has meant people have had to give up their pets all together. I have personally experienced rejection due to having 2 well behaved kittens, even though I am a very good tenant and know many more people who struggle finding a suitable home due to this.
attributes.background: Make the new Model Tenancy Agreement legally binding to stop landlords putting a blanket ban on well behaved pets.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban Blanket No Pet Clauses in Tenancy Agreements & Leases.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566355
